did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Audio recordings, correspondence, legal documents, manuscripts.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Office files, videotape, posters, copies of articles by others, and books reflecting Blank's work and interests as a sex educator and owner of Down There Press and Good Vibrations. Included are many articles by Susie Bright and Annie Sprinkle.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Sex educator and founder of Good Vibrations, the first sex-positive, woman-friendly adult store in the United States, with branches in San Francisco and Berkeley, California. Blank also wrote A kid's first book about sex and The playbook for kids about sex, and founded Down There Press.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Office files, videotape, posters, copies of articles by others, and books reflecting Blank's work and interests as a sex educator and owner of Down There Press and Good Vibrations. Included are many articles by Susie Bright and Annie Sprinkle.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Joani Blank papers, #7827. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Books are to be cataloged individually.
